artist: Delineator: After Antoine Boizot; Engraver: Johan Georg Wille; Publisher: Michel Odieuvre
description: portrait of Thierry III. King of Franks; bearded man wearing crown, in profile to right; bust length; wearing cape wrapped around him in an oval frame
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in image in black:  Boizot del   J.G. Will sculp / THIERRY I / XV Roy de France / mort en 670 apres 16 ans de regne / A Paris chez Odieuvre, quai de l\'Ecole a la Belle image | on sheet in pencil: 2-607 / 1-145
title: Thierry I
